english.segment1: CHORUS. As long as I live, as long as I live, I will praise (2nd time replace with "love") you, I will praise ("love") you. As long as I live, as long as I live, I will praise ("love") you.
english.segment2: VERSE. Because your love is better, better than life, because your love is better than life, my lips will glorify you. As.. (CHORUS)
english.segment3: VERSE. And in your name I'll lift up, lift up my hands. In your name I'll lift my hands, and my lips will glorify you. As long as I live as long as I live, I will serve ("praise") you, I will "praise" you. As long as I live, as long as I live, I will "praise" you. (repeat with the word "praise" on 2nd time).
